Key Match Events: Karl-Anthony Towns had 32 points, 11 rebounds and five assists.
Jalen Brunson chipped in 15 points and nine assists.
Josh Hart had 11 points, nine rebounds and seven assists.
Giannis Antetokounmpo had 24 points and 12 rebounds.
The Knicks led by as many as 30 points after starting the fourth quarter on a 22-11 run, keyed by guard Miles McBride (14 points) and rookie Tyler Kolek (8 points).
Towns fired up the home crowd by slamming home two one-handed dunks in the second quarter, one over Milwaukee center Brook Lopez.
Towns scored 27 points in the first half as New York built a 66-47 lead at halftime.
